name: string(at:effectiveRange:endsWithSearchBoundary:)
desc: Returns the found string that is created by conceptually mapping its content to a single string, which is composed of a concatenation of all its substrings.
declaration:
optional func string(at characterIndex: Int, 
      effectiveRange outRange: NSRangePointer, 
endsWithSearchBoundary outFlag: UnsafeMutablePointer<ObjCBool>) -> String
